description: This table contains information from the Additional Clinical Actions Needed (I ORC 7685) item.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ADDL_CLINICAL_ACT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used when creating a case request to indicate what additional clinical actions are needed.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined
